verses.name: Psalms 102:1
verses.text: Hear my prayer, O Lord, and let my cry come unto thee.

verses.name: Psalms 102:2
verses.text: Hide not thy face from me in the day when I am in trouble; incline thine ear unto me: in the day when I call answer me speedily.

verses.name: Psalms 102:3
verses.text: For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.

verses.name: Psalms 102:4
verses.text: My heart is smitten, and withered like grass; so that I forget to eat my bread.

verses.name: Psalms 102:5
verses.text: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin.

verses.name: Psalms 102:6
verses.text: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.

verses.name: Psalms 102:7
verses.text: I watch, and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top.

verses.name: Psalms 102:8
verses.text: Mine enemies reproach me all the day; and they that are mad against me are sworn against me.

verses.name: Psalms 102:9
verses.text: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mingled my drink with weeping,

verses.name: Psalms 102:10
verses.text: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.

verses.name: Psalms 102:11
verses.text: My days are like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.

verses.name: Psalms 102:12
verses.text: But thou, O Lord, shalt endure for ever; and thy remembrance unto all generations.

verses.name: Psalms 102:13
verses.text: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.

verses.name: Psalms 102:14
verses.text: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones, and favour the dust thereof.

verses.name: Psalms 102:15
verses.text: So the heathen shall fear the name of the Lord, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.

verses.name: Psalms 102:16
verses.text: When the Lord shall build up Zion, he shall appear in his glory.

verses.name: Psalms 102:17
verses.text: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.

verses.name: Psalms 102:18
verses.text: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 102:19
verses.text: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary; from heaven did the Lord behold the earth;

verses.name: Psalms 102:20
verses.text: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;

verses.name: Psalms 102:21
verses.text: To declare the name of the Lord in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;

verses.name: Psalms 102:22
verses.text: When the people are gathered together, and the kingdoms, to serve the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 102:23
verses.text: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.

verses.name: Psalms 102:24
verses.text: I said, O my God, take me not away in the midst of my days: thy years are throughout all generations.

verses.name: Psalms 102:25
verses.text: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth: and the heavens are the work of thy hands.

verses.name: Psalms 102:26
verses.text: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed:

verses.name: Psalms 102:27
verses.text: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.

verses.name: Psalms 102:28
verses.text: The children of thy servants shall continue, and their seed shall be established before thee.
